issue.title: [CF 653] Show Arcane Charge and Arcane Missile Proc and Variable
issue.body:

^1^T^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SArcane~`Charge ^SEnabled^B ^SOnlyMine^B ^SShowTTText^B ^t^N60414^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Second Icon - Show Arcane Missle Proc and level - here is the icon I created - doesn't seem to work:

^1^T^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SArcane~`Missiles ^SEnabled^B ^SShowTTText^B ^t^N60414^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Any help would be greatly appreciated on how to create these icons.  Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Iannet | Imported from CurseForge issue #653 | Raw

comments.body:
I don't have a mage that I can test with, and I don't know exactly how these spells work, so it might be a little bit hard.

From what I can discern from the comments on Wowhead, though, Arcane Charge is placed on you as a debuff, not a buff.

For both icons, have you tried them without the "Show Variable Text" option enabled? It seems to me that both of these spells work by giving you stacks, not by a single stack with data that must be extracted from the tooltip.

Edited Oct 3, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Placing Arcane Charge as a debuff works perfectly. I always though it was a buff on me.

Can you help me with my Arcane Missile Proc Icon. I've removed the show variable text and I can't seem to get it working. Is the right process to setup a proc a buff to myself in general? I recognize you don't have a mage - as I cast spells my Arcane Missle procs up to 2 times - I'd like an icon to show me when my Arcane Missile has proced and how many stackes (1or2)

I can't seem to get this one to work and thank you in advance.


> Posted by CurseForge user Iannet

I have the Arcane Missile proc now working - I had to select Arcane Missles! not Arcane Missles - sorry for the questions and thank you for helping.


> Posted by CurseForge user Iannet
